meanings.definition: A period of darkness between sunset and sunrise.
meanings.sent1: During the nite, the stars twinkle in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I like to sleep during the nite and be awake during the day.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was playtime during the nite and kept meowing.
meanings.sent4: In the nite, the city transforms into a magical place with lights.
meanings.sent5: The nite was so dark that I couldn't see my hand in front of my face.

meanings.definition: A shortened, informal spelling of the word 'night.'
meanings.sent1: Let's have a movie nite with popcorn and snacks.
meanings.sent2: I stayed up all nite studying for the exam.
meanings.sent3: The nite was so fun that we lost track of time.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone brightly in the nite sky.
meanings.sent5: We had a nite out with friends, laughing and chatting.
